review:
Recently we had a Clevicle bone surgery for my friend  with Dr. Sundar Ganesh @ Guest Hospital ,Kilpauk. 
The surgery was very much sucessful and through out the treatment he has been like our friend and giving us the confidance about the treatment and also very transperant in his communications.
Also gave us important guidelines about  post surgery medications and exercises.
